title: Jhin, more Riot idiocy
body:
When you close distance with an ADC, shouldnt you have the edge in the fight? Since they are squish?

But no, not jihn, he will crit you and speed boost away, crit you and speed boost away.  Soooo no problem being squishy, since he can't be locked down easily.  Great.

Why does Riot have to go full retard on so many champion designs? 

I am so God damn sick of Riot creating champions and items that are total BS, and favor heavily certain champions over others. 

Riot, save us the trouble and just eliminate all but 20 champions since thats all thats played anyways.  Why tease us with variety.

Marc Merrill, you say you are a gamer? Yeah, maybe long ago. Now you run a company designed to annoy and aggravate people, basically taking advantage of people who love gaming, teasing them with a game that sounds great in theory, but the execution annoys and addicts and frustrates, as you fate is dependent on 4 strangers every match.

replies.body: You seem to not understand the concept of kiting, one of the fundamental aspects of this game genere since it was created.
That is not what Im talking about.

So then what is it? Because this:

> will crit you and speed boost away, crit you and speed boost away.

is kiting.
Yes but he gets a speed boost for every crit he does..so basically as long has is attacking he out speeds you.

That would only happen late game, because as you said, its every CRIT.  And are you really suggesting his crit movement speed is an issue when we have adcs with tumbles, rocket jumps and relentless pursuits?
Wait, you think Jhin is _too_ mobile? Oooooookay.
Or chaining CC. Kinda important thing to do to lock down carries

So you are saying that adcs, who are supposed to need someone to peel and protect them, hence why they are called carries, should be able to, at mid game, just be able to be OP and untouchable without any support in a 1v1 situation?
Lol you can't catch an immobile, dashless adc? I fear how you'll get a lucian.......

bruh, you stupid

out of all the champs that are stupid strong right now and scale way too well with AD items/sated you choose Jhin?
As everyone said ADCs deal tons of damage that's their identity. On the other hand they are squishy and need to know how to kite and position themselves because they are often the main target. Even if he has a great team that peels for him, a bad ADC that can't kite or position himself will get deleted by an average team.
I see nothing wrong with a champ like Jhin having a kiting passive. He's easy to catch and when he ults he's a sitting duck.

What would you do about Vayne's tumble/ult/condemn?
What would you do about Ezreal's arcane shift?
Corki's W?

They all have something to kite and move out of trouble.
I think he took a Vayne thread from ~2 years ago, replaced the word Vayne with Jhin and Tumble with Speed boost.

We are now in a generation where Jhin's bonus movement speed from crits are considered more mobile than {{champion:238}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:64}} .

Exhibit 1: OP's thread.
Hateboner for a champion, bad reasoning, **and** a yes or yes poll? My, my, this thread has everything.
